verses.verse: "Listen <S%H8085><s%> to this, <S%H3548><s%> you priests! Listen, <S%H7181><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and give ear, <S%H238><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of the king! <S%H4428><s%> For the judgment <S%H4941><s%> is against you; <S%H6341><s%> for you have been a snare at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> and a net <S%H7568><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> on Tabor. <S%H8396><s%>
The rebels <S%H7846><s%> are deep <S%H6009><s%> in slaughter; <S%H7819><s%> but I discipline all of them. <S%H4148><s%>

I know <S%H3045><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> is not hidden <S%H3582><s%> from me; <S%H669><s%> for now, Ephraim, you have played the prostitute. <S%H2181><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> is defiled. <S%H2930><s%>

Their deeds <S%H4611><s%> won't <S%H5414><s%> allow them to turn <S%H7725><s%> to their God; <S%H430><s%> for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of prostitution <S%H2183><s%> is within <S%H7130><s%> them, <S%H3045><s%> and they don't know Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The pride <S%H1347><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> testifies <S%H6030><s%> to his face. <S%H6440><s%> Therefore Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will stumble <S%H3782><s%> in their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> also will stumble with them. <S%H3782><s%>

They will go <S%H3212><s%> with their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and with their herds <S%H1241><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> but they won't <S%H4672><s%> find him. <S%H2502><s%> He has withdrawn himself from them.

They are unfaithful <S%H898><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for they have borne <S%H3205><s%> illegitimate <S%H2114><s%> children. <S%H1121><s%> Now the new moon <S%H2320><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> them with their fields. <S%H2506><s%>

"Blow <S%H8628><s%> the cornet <S%H7782><s%> in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> and the trumpet <S%H2689><s%> in Ramah! <S%H7414><s%> Sound a battle <S%H7321><s%> cry at Beth Aven, <S%H1007><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> you, <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin!

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will become a desolation <S%H8047><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of rebuke. <S%H8433><s%> Among the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I have made known <S%H3045><s%> that which will surely be. <S%H539><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> are like those who remove <S%H5253><s%> a landmark. <S%H1366><s%> I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H5678><s%> on them like water. <S%H4325><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is oppressed, <S%H6231><s%> he is crushed <S%H7533><s%> in judgment; <S%H4941><s%> Because he is intent <S%H2974><s%> in his pursuit <S%H1980><s%> of <S%H310><s%> idols. <S%H6673><s%>
Therefore I am to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> like a moth, <S%H6211><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> like rottenness. <S%H7538><s%>

"When Ephraim <S%H669><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> his sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> his wound, <S%H4205><s%> Then Ephraim <S%H669><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Jareb: <S%H3377><s%> but he is not able <S%H3201><s%> to heal <S%H7495><s%> you, <S%H1455><s%> neither will he cure you of your wound. <S%H4205><s%>

For I will be to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> like a lion, <S%H7826><s%> and like a young lion <S%H3715><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> I myself will tear <S%H2963><s%> in pieces and go away. <S%H3212><s%> I will carry off, <S%H5375><s%> and there will be no one to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>

I will go <S%H3212><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to my place, <S%H4725><s%> until they acknowledge their offense, <S%H816><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> my face. <S%H6440><s%> In their affliction <S%H6862><s%> they will seek me earnestly. <S%H7836><s%>"
